metadata.description: Claude Code plugins from Trail of Bits for enhanced AI-assisted security analysis and development

plugins.name: ask-questions-if-underspecified
plugins.description: Clarify requirements before implementing. When doubting, ask questions.

plugins.name: audit-context-building
plugins.description: Build deep architectural context through ultra-granular code analysis before vulnerability hunting

plugins.name: building-secure-contracts
plugins.description: Comprehensive smart contract security toolkit based on Trail of Bits' Building Secure Contracts framework. Includes vulnerability scanners for 6 blockchains and 5 development guideline assistants.

plugins.name: burpsuite-project-parser
plugins.description: Search and extract data from Burp Suite project files (.burp) for use in Claude

plugins.name: constant-time-analysis
plugins.description: Detect compiler-induced timing side-channels in cryptographic code

plugins.name: culture-index
plugins.description: Interprets Culture Index survey results for individuals and teams

plugins.name: devcontainer-setup
plugins.description: Create pre-configured devcontainers with Claude Code and language-specific tooling

plugins.name: differential-review
plugins.description: Security-focused differential review of code changes with git history analysis and blast radius estimation

plugins.name: firebase-apk-scanner
plugins.description: Scan Android APKs for Firebase security misconfigurations including open databases, storage buckets, authentication issues, and exposed cloud functions. For authorized security research only.

plugins.name: fix-review
plugins.description: Verify fix commits address audit findings without introducing bugs

plugins.name: dwarf-expert
plugins.description: Interact with and understand the DWARF debugging format

plugins.name: entry-point-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyzes smart contract codebases to identify state-changing entry points for security auditing. Detects externally callable functions that modify state, categorizes them by access level, and generates structured audit reports.

plugins.name: property-based-testing
plugins.description: Property-based testing guidance for multiple languages and smart contracts

plugins.name: semgrep-rule-creator
plugins.description: Create custom Semgrep rules for detecting bug patterns and security vulnerabilities

plugins.name: semgrep-rule-variant-creator
plugins.description: Creates language variants of existing Semgrep rules with proper applicability analysis and test-driven validation

plugins.name: sharp-edges
plugins.description: Identify error-prone APIs, dangerous configurations, and footgun designs that enable security mistakes

plugins.name: static-analysis
plugins.description: Static analysis toolkit with CodeQL, Semgrep, and SARIF parsing for security vulnerability detection

plugins.name: spec-to-code-compliance
plugins.description: Specification-to-code compliance checker for blockchain audits with evidence-based alignment analysis

plugins.name: testing-handbook-skills
plugins.description: Skills from the Trail of Bits Application Security Testing Handbook (appsec.guide)

plugins.name: variant-analysis
plugins.description: Find similar vulnerabilities and bugs across codebases using pattern-based analysis

plugins.name: modern-python
plugins.description: Modern Python best practices. Use when creating new Python projects, and writing Python scripts, or migrating existing projects from legacy tools.

plugins.name: insecure-defaults
plugins.description: Detects and verifies insecure default configurations including hardcoded credentials, fallback secrets, weak authentication defaults, and dangerous configuration values that remain active in production

plugins.name: second-opinion
plugins.description: Runs code reviews using external LLM CLIs (OpenAI Codex, Google Gemini) on uncommitted changes, branch diffs, or specific commits

plugins.name: yara-authoring
plugins.description: YARA-X detection rule authoring with linting and quality analysis
